org.fest.swing.fixture

Class VFSJFileChooserFixture<FileObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fest.swing.fixture.ComponentFixture<VFSJFileChooser<FileObject>>
      • org.fest.swing.fixture.VFSJFileChooserFixture<FileObject>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fest.swing.fixture.CommonComponentFixture, org.fest.swing.fixture.FocusableComponentFixture, org.fest.swing.fixture.KeyboardInputSimulationFixture, org.fest.swing.fixture.MouseInputSimulationFixture, org.fest.swing.fixture.StateVerificationFixture

    public class VFSJFileChooserFixture<FileObject>
extends org.fest.swing.fixture.ComponentFixture<VFSJFileChooser<FileObject>>
implements org.fest.swing.fixture.CommonComponentFixture
    Understands functional testing of VFSJFileChoosers:
    • user input simulation
    • state verification
    • property value query

      • selectFile

        public VFSJFileChooserFixture<FileObject> selectFile(FileObject file)
        Selects the given file in this fixture's VFSJFileChooser.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to select.
        Returns:
        this fixture.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given file is null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser is disabled.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser is not showing on the screen.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser can select directories only and the file to select is not a directory.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser cannot select directories and the file to select is a directory.

      • selectFiles

        public VFSJFileChooserFixture<FileObject> selectFiles(FileObject... files)

        Parameters:
        files - the files to select.
        Returns:
        this fixture.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given array of files is null.

        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser is disabled.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser is not showing on the screen.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser does not support multiple selection and there is more than one file to select.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser can select directories only and any of the files to select is not a directory.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser cannot select directories and any of the files to select is a directory.

        public VFSJFileChooserFixture<FileObject> pressAndReleaseKey(org.fest.swing.core.KeyPressInfo keyPressInfo)
        Simulates a user pressing given key with the given modifiers on this fixture's VFSJFileChooser. Modifiers is a mask from the available InputEvent masks.
        Specified by:
        pressAndReleaseKey in interface org.fest.swing.fixture.KeyboardInputSimulationFixture
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this fixture.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given KeyPressInfo is null.

        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser is disabled.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this fixture's VFSJFileChooser is not showing on the screen.
